title: Schedule of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill meetings today, 6-25-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 25, 2009

 



Schedule of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill meetings today, 6-25-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                              June 25, 2009    SCHEDULE OF JUDGE SOTOMAYOR’S CAPITOL HILL MEETINGS THURSDAY, JUNE 25th  Today, Judge Sotomayor will visit Capitol Hill to meet with the following Senators: Senator Jim Bunning (R-KY)  Senator Mike Johanns (R-NE)  Senator John Kerry (D-MA)  Senator Jeff Merkley (D-OR)  Senator James Risch (R-ID)
